Learning of Christ. 

     I think it would be very becoming to all who claim to follow Christ, to be indeed learning of Christ, -- his methods, and his meekness, and lowliness of heart. We have a decided message to bear. In Jude 1-8 we have the description of the pollution of the world, and the working agencies of Satan to corrupt the world; yet Michael, the Archangel, when contending with the devil, disputed about the body of Moses, and dared not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, "The Lord rebuke thee."
